snippet.title: Earth Atlantis: PAX West Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Earth Atlantis is a side-scrolling shooter with an original "Monster-Hunting" gameplay. Search and hunt down dreadful sea monsters and explore the post-apocalyptic underwater world. Earth Atlantis is coming to Nintendo Switch this fall!

Learn more about Earth Atlantis! https://goo.gl/YLfF5S

#NintendoSwitch #PAXWest2017 #EarthAtlantis

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
